title: Last Night in Soho
actors: Thomasin McKenzie, Anya Taylor-Joy, Matt Smith
plot: Aspiring fashion designer Eloise is mysteriously able to return to 1960s London, where she encounters dazzling wannabe singer Sandie. But the glamour is not as it seems, and the dreams of the past crack and splinter into something...
awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA 24 wins & 77 nominations total
